title: Shuk's Palak Paneer
directions: Microwave spinach for 5 minutes on power level 7 until thawed and slightly warm. Set aside to cool. When it is cool, mince in a blender or food processor. Add water if using a blender.
In a wide, 10-inch saucepan add the oil on medium heat. Add the cardamom and cinnamon and toast for 1-2 minutes.
Add onions and saute until light brown.
Add garlic, ginger, haldi and mirchi powder and saute for 1 minute.
Add tomato paste and 2 tbsp water and saute for 3-4 minutes on low heat until oil separates from the masala.
Add blended cooked spinach, garam masala and salt and stir to evenly combine and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add the paneer cubes, cook for 1-2 minutes and turn off heat.
ingredients: 8 oz. paneer, cut into 1/2 inch cubes
